          <title>
            <string language="sl">Poišči in pobarvaj</string>
            <string language="en">Find and color</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entdeckung und Farbe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trouvaille et couleur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Achado e cor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ritrovamento e colore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρείτε και χρωματίστε</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hallazgo y color</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Reševalec razvija sposobnost zaznavanja povezav med različnimi elementi in razločuje bistveno na področju strukture.</string>
            <string language="en">Exercise to recognize connections between different elements and distinguish different structures.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">enako</string>
            <string language="en">same</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">podobno</string>
            <string language="en">similar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pobarvanka</string>
            <string language="en">coloring book</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">podrobnost</string>
            <string language="en">detail</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trainieren Sie, um Anschlüsse zwischen 
unterschiedlichen Elementen zu erkennen und unterschiedliche 
Strukturen zu unterscheiden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercez-vous pour identifier des connexions entre 
différents éléments et pour distinguer différentes structures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercite para reconhecer conexões entre elementos
diferentes e para distinguir estruturas diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitisi per riconoscere i collegamenti fra gli 
elementi differenti e per distinguere le strutture differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκηση για να αναγνωρίσει τις συνδέσεις μεταξύ των 
διαφορετικών στοιχείων και να διακρίνει τις διαφορετικές δομές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejercite para reconocer conexiones entre diversos 
elementos y para distinguir diversas estructuras.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">selben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ähnlich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
